original_text: Why have you despised the word of the Lord, to do what is evil in his sight? You have struck down Uriah the Hittite with the sword and have taken his wife to be your wife and have killed him with the sword of the Ammonites.
korean_text: 그러한데 어찌하여 네가 여호와의 말씀을 업신여기고 나 보기에 악을 행하였느냐 네가 칼로 헷 사람 우리아를 치되 암몬 자손의 칼로 죽이고 그의 아내를 빼앗아 네 아내로 삼았도다

sentences.original_text: Why have you despised the word of the Lord,
to do what is evil in his sight?
You have struck down Uriah the Hittite with the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 칼로 헷 사람 우리아를 쳐서 죽이고

sentences.original_text: and have taken his wife to be your wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내를 빼앗아 네 아내로 삼았으며

sentences.original_text: and have killed him with the sword of the Ammonites.
